titleStmt.title: SII 7.869: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 869. (A.R. No. 241 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṉṉi vaḷara Irunila maṭan=taiyum poṟcaya pāvaiyum cirtaṉic celviyum taṉ perunteviyarāka Iṉpuṟa neṭutuyil Ūḻiyu ḷiṭaituṟai
nāṭum tuṭarvaṉavelip paṭar vaṉavāciyuñ cuḷḷiccūḻ matiḷ koḷḷippākkaiyum naṇṇaṟkarumuraṇ maṇṇaikkaṭakkamum porukaṭal Īḻattarai
car tammuṭiyum Āṅkavar teviyar Oṅkeḻil muṭiyum muṉṉavarpakkal teṉṉavar vaitta cuntaramuṭiyum Intiraṉ ṉāramum teṇṭirai Īḻamaṇṭala muḻuvatum Eṟipa
ṭaik keraḷaṉ muṟaimaiyiṟ cūṭuṅ kulataṉamākiya palar pukaḻ muṭiyum ceṅkatir mālaiyum caṅkatirvelai tolperuṅkāval pal paḻantivum ceṟuviṟ ciṉaviy I
rupattorukāl Araicukaḷai kaṭṭa paracurāmaṉ mevaruñ cāntimattīvaraṇ karuti Iruttiya cempoṟ ṟiruttaku muṭiyum māpporu taṇṭāṟ koṇṭa kopparakecari
panmarāna śrīirājen=tiracoḻadevarkku yāṇṭu 8vatu malāṭaṉa caṉaṉātavaḷanāṭṭuk kuṟukkaikkūṟṟattu tirukkovalūr tiruviraṭṭāṉammuṭaiyārkku malāṭu
Uṭaiyāṉ Irāmaṉ mummaṭicoḻaṉāṉa rājentiracoḻamalāṭuṭaiyāṉ muṉṟusandhiyum Amutucetaruḷa paṉṉirunāḻi pālāl tayiramutukku vaitta
cāvā muvā pacu toṇṇūṟṟāṟuṅ koṇṭu can=tirātittavaṟ Aṭṭuvatāṉom kuruviyamalaiyaṉ muṅkilāṉa kovalviṭaṅka perumaṉṟāṭiyum nakka ṉuḻun=tūraṉāṉa vitiviṭaṅka pe
rumaṉṟāṭiyum Ivviruvom Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.869 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
